titles.title: CB 137 For all that You've done

properties.copyright: 1991 Shepherd's Heart Music, Inc., Administered by Word Music Group, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
For all that You've done
I will thank You
For all that You're going to do
For all that You've promised
And all that You are
Is all that has carried me through
Jesus I thank You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I thank You, thank You, Lord
(sisters echo)
Thank You, thank You, Lord
(sisters echo)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Thank You for loving
And setting me free
Thank You for giving
Your life just for me
How I thank You.
Gratefully thank You, thank you.

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
And I thank You, and I thank You,
Thank You, Lord.
Thank You, thank You.
